blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab

Class ActionListenerComponent<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.gameLogic.components.base.ComponentBase
      • blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab.ActionListenerComponent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Extends Object and should be the type of notifications sent by the observable presented in the constructor.

    public class ActionListenerComponent<T>
extends ComponentBase
    An implementation of this component class will be able to listen to input through the presented observable. It is not required to register this component to the LogicEngine, as the update() method implementation is empty. On activate() the observable will be subscribed to. On deactivate() the subscription will be canceled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActionListenerComponent(io.reactivex.Observable inputActionObservable, io.reactivex.functions.Predicate<T> filter, java.util.function.BiConsumer<T,Entity> action)
      Default constructor for creating a new instance of ActionListenerComponent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onActivate()
      Activates the component by subscribing to the filtered observable and calling the super implementation of activate().
      void onDeactivate()
      Deactivates the component by unsubscribing to the observable and calling the super implementation of deactivate().
      void update()
      This implementation of the update() is empty, and will not have to be called each frame.

      • Methods inherited from class blackengine.gameLogic.components.base.ComponentBase

        activate, deactivate, destroy, getMapping, getParent, isActive, isDestroyed, lateUpdate, setParent

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionListenerComponent

        public ActionListenerComponent(io.reactivex.Observable inputActionObservable,
                               io.reactivex.functions.Predicate<T> filter,
                               java.util.function.BiConsumer<T,Entity> action)
        Default constructor for creating a new instance of ActionListenerComponent.
        Parameters:
        inputActionObservable - An implementation of Observable<T>.
        filter - A function that returns true for all input actions that are checked in the action.
        action - The action that will be performed on the parent entity when an input action is received that passed through the filter.
